name: Alice Adventure: Endless Runner (2021)
description:
-STORY-

The evil Yeth (from the hit brand new popular video game Yeth 2 (SAGE 2021 Demo)) wants to battle the Alice family at random times during their nightly stroll though Zlaneburg City because he wasn't included as a playable character in Alice Adventure: Definitive Edition Version 1.5 update.

-CONTROLS-

Title Screen/Menus - press any key on the title screen, click on an option when on the menu screen with your mouse.

Main Game - left arrow to slow down and right arrow to speed up, use the up arrow to jump, and when a green target thing appears on an enemy, press the space bar to preform a homing attack.

GAMEPAD CONTROLLERS ARE ACCEPTED AS WELL! A TINY WHITE BOX WITH A BLACK BORDER WILL APPEAR ON THE GAME IF USING A CONTROLLER!
